title: Did the Prophet ﷺ‎ send salutations (Durood) upon himself & how? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: china he says did the prophet salallahu salaam offer salutation upon himself then says yes and how did he offer that as we offer solitation upon him because this is a form of rebada a form of worship to allah so he used to say allah musa muhammad and he's muhammad ali in prayer and outside of prayer
